item.title: Spiced Cider
item.description: Ingredients 1 gallon apple cider 6 cinnamon sticks 1 tsp whole black peppercorns 1/2 inch ginger, thinly sliced 3 round orange slices Instructions Place peppercorns and ginger in a tea infuser Pour all other ingredients, plus tea infuser, into a pot that can comfortably hold a gallon Bring to a boil, and then let simmer for 20 minutes Enjoy! (or else)
